pages.text: Carrying first-aid supplies will be handy in times of emergencies.$(br2)They take some time to use, so I need to make sure I'm in a safe area before applying.$(br2)$(o)Only 1 method of crafting is shown after, but there are various ways to craft with moss, soap, glistering melon, etc.
